titles.title: Congratulating the University of California at Santa Barbara men's soccer team, the 2006 National Collegiate Athletic Association Champions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Mr. Yarmuth moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 70.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/29/2007--Passed House amended. Congratulates the University of California at Santa Barbara men's soccer team on an outstanding championship season.
